scripts.~libs:build: npm run ~pran-phonemes:build && npm run ~pran-animation:build && npm run ~pran-animation-editor:build
scripts.~pran-echo:build: npm --prefix ./pran-echo/frontend run prepare-install && npm --prefix ./pran-echo/frontend install ./pran-echo/frontend && npm --prefix ./pran-echo/frontend run build
scripts.~pran-animation:build: npm --prefix ./pran-animation/frontend run prepare-install && npm --prefix ./pran-animation/frontend install ./pran-animation/frontend && npm --prefix ./pran-animation/frontend run build-pack
scripts.~pran-animation-editor:build: npm --prefix ./pran-animation-editor/frontend run prepare-install && npm --prefix ./pran-animation-editor/frontend install ./pran-animation-editor/frontend && npm --prefix ./pran-animation-editor/frontend run build-pack
